title: pubs and bars worth mention
name: pubs and bars worth mention
description:
A Map by J4yx0r

Here's a list of pubs/bars/dives/saloons/whathaveyous I've had the fortune (or misfortune) of owing my patronage to.  The problem with a map such as this is that if I had a TRULY spectacular time at a place, there's a chance I don't remember the name or location.  Rats.

properties.name: Atomic Grill (formerly)
properties.description: Posted by J4yx0r 99 Chestnut St., 02903Closed down several years ago, but once featured a great selection of drinks and eclectic, yummy food all with a nuclear physics theme. Locally famous for something called their "Hell Mash" which was some chili pepper base that could strip the paint off walls from seven hundred yards. Damn tasty, though.

properties.name: Enrico Caruso Club
properties.description: Posted by J4yx0r 105 Bouvier Avenue, 02838A sort of rent-me-if-you-dare type reception hall that does weekly karaoake, has terrible bottled beer and frightening clientelle.

properties.name: Holiday Bowl
properties.description: Posted by J4yx0r 7515 Lomas Blvd NE, 87110Bowling, bar and such. Their logo kinda looks like three dolphins getting amorous with a bowling ball screaming in pleasure or pain.,

properties.name: Kara O'Caens Irish Pub
properties.description: Posted by J4yx0r   303 S Jefferson St, 24011Excellent tap selection, really nice atmosphere, great live entertainment, nice people, friendly service.

properties.name: Kelly's Brewery
properties.description: Posted by J4yx0r  3222 Central Ave SE, Albuquerque, NM 87106An excellent little brewpub with a wide selection on tap and some really tasty pub fare. I recommend the ostrich burgers!

properties.name: NoBar
properties.description: Posted by J4yx0r  10622 Magnolia Blvd, 91601Expensive, ubertrendy, crowded.

properties.name: Robin Hood Pub Inc
properties.description: Posted by J4yx0r   13640 Burbank Boulevard, Sherman Oaks, CA, 91401Robin Hood Pub Inc 818-994-6045

properties.name: Sardo's
properties.description: Posted by J4yx0r 259 N. Pass Avenue, 91505Expensive drinks, crappy tap selection, but decent atmosphere, fun clientelle and karaoake every evening.

properties.name: Sunset Grill
properties.description: Posted by J4yx0r  130 Brighton Avenue, Allston, MA, 02134Sunset Grill 617-254-1331 The place has decent food, but the main attraction is the gigantic and ever changing offering of brews on tap numbering in the hundreds and several hundred in the bottle as well.

properties.name: The Bitter End
properties.description: Posted by J4yx0r  770 5th Avenue, San Diego, CA, 92101The Bitter End 619-338-9300

properties.name: Trinity Brewhouse
properties.description: Posted by Drmomentum  186 Fountain St., Providence, RI.The Trinity Brewhouse is a great little pub/restaurant just within walking distance of the Providence Place Mall. Great IPA. Also, I the pulled pork sandwich and wings are worth a try.
